title: Mercari: Buy and Sell App
description:
MERCARI is resale made easy! With ZERO selling fees and 1000s of new and used items dropping daily, millions are shopping and selling on the Mercari marketplace.

List in seconds, make $$$ and fund your next find. From clothing to collectibles, vintage Valentino to new gaming Nintendo, find deals at up to 70% off retail. Resell what you no longer need!

Looking for even more? Now you can find and discover unique and exclusive Japanese brands and collectibles! Get even BETTER deals on brands you love, straight from Japan. Shop popular toys and collectibles exclusive to Japan, alongside huge brands like COMME des GARÇONS, A Bathing Ape, and Sanrio!

New users receive a $5 credit towards any purchase! Terms apply.**

LIST AND SELL ON MERCARI
- List items in seconds – sell collectibles, clothing, vintage items, electronics, bags, beauty, fragrance, makeup and more
- Get paid quickly with Instant Pay or direct deposit.
- Sell securely with ratings, reviews and seller protection

ONLINE SHOPPING FOR LESS
- Thrift clothes, collectibles, vintage goods, one-of-a-kind treasures, pre-loved pieces and more
- Find deals on brands, at a great price
- Marketplace to shop new, like-new, and used items
- Get notified of price drops and exclusive offers from sellers

THRIFT GREAT BRANDS
- Buy clothing, shoes, and more. Shop from top brands including:
- Lululemon, Athleta and Vuori athletic apparel
- Nike, Adidas and Jordan sneakers
- Apple, Sony and Microsoft phones and devices

FIND FAVORITES FROM NICHE BRANDS
- Little Sleepies and Posh Peanut jammies
- Tamashii Nations, Funko and Sonny Angel figurines
- Loungefly backpacks and Hello Kitty or Sanrio toys

COLLECTIBLES FOR EVERY FAN
- TCGs like Pokémon and Magic the Gathering trading cards
- Topps and Upper Deck sports cards
- BTS and ATEEZ photo cards
- DC, Marvel, Dragon Ball Z and Star Wars action figures
- Collectible pins and coins

USED ELECTRONICS FOR LOW PRICES
- Find vintage gaming consoles and games
- Shop drones, computers, laptops, tablets and accessories
- Buy used and vintage cameras, camera lenses and camera bags
- Browse guitars, keyboards, electric drums, amps and other instruments

AUTHENTICATED LUXURY SHOPPING
- Shopping for authenticated luxury goods? Buy designer handbags, shoes and jewelry from brands like Coach, Marc Jacobs and Dior
- Items with a diamond badge are authenticated by independent experts, and every US purchase is protected

FLEXIBLE PRICING AND ONLINE SHOPPING TOOLS THAT WORK FOR YOU
- Shop within your budget. Make offers to negotiate pricing
- Pay with Venmo, PayPal, credit card, split your payments or use your Mercari balance
- Chat with sellers, view ratings and reviews, and get buyer protection
- Get your item as described or your money back with free return shipping

ENJOY NATIONWIDE SHIPPING & DELIVERY
- Use Mercari Prepaid Labels to price and print seller or buyer-paid shipping labels with UPS, FedEx and USPS including Media Mail and first class envelopes, or ship on your own, track your shipments, and get up to $200 shipping protection (US ONLY)
- Shop internationally with our shipping partner Beenos, with additional protections on all orders backed by Mercari
- With Mercari Local, buy and sell large, heavy or bulky items by using pickup and delivery with Uber

DOWNLOAD TODAY AND FIND OUT WHAT MAKES MERCARI THE EASY WAY TO THRIFT!

*This promotional credit will be issued shortly after registration and expires seven (7) days after issuance. Credits will be applied to one or more of your next transactions on Mercari until the full value of the credit has been depleted or expires. Credits have no cash value. Mercari reserves the right to update or alter these terms at any time, with or without notice. Limit one credit distribution per user. This credit is not transferable and cannot be redeemed for cash.

Available in the US for anyone 18+

summary: Shop the latest items & unique used goods. Sell pre-loved items and earn money.
developerAddress: 東京都港区六本木6-10-1 六本木ヒルズ森タワー 18F
